titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of hand crafted stone figurines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on hand crafted figurines of precious or semiprecious stone, not jewelry grade.
